refsect1.title: The change meta-data and update button

listitem.para: If the password was created with the "Add existing" button: use the "change meta-data & update" button.
If the password was created with the "Create new" button: use the "update" button.
If the minimal required length for the password or the maximal allowed length or the allowable characters have changed: use the "change meta-data & update" button.

refsect1.title: Difference between Add existing and Create new
refsect1.para: Click on those buttons and see what happens. They are not dangerous.

refsect1.title: Undo Redo
refsect1.para: The "Undo" and "Redo" buttons undoes/redoes the LATEST change in the password tab or the fake-password tab, independent of which tab you're currently in.

refsect1.title: fake-passwords/honey pots
refsect1.para: The fake-passwords/honey pots are intended to be used as traps to catch crackers. The "pick" buttons picks a random fake-password, independent of what you have selected. You should add fake-passwords such as "password" and "drowssap".
